title: 5001st normal game
body:
https://imgur.com/a/7gRSD

just realized after counting the win/lose counter that this is my 5001st normal game. should have saved the 5000th but didnt realize at the time.

replies.body: Congrats, Im up to my 3000 or so normal game, not sure if these big numbers are celebratory.... or something to cry about {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Haha congrats! I'm just a bit over 5k myself, if i could figure out where they put the games played statistic in the new client i'd screenshot mine too. 

Welcome to the "We play League of Legends too much" club. :P
I remember certain stats were reset to zero when transferring from NA at the start of OCE, anyone know if normal win counts reset in that?
i remember when i transfered all my honor points and friend list is gone but i kept the games played

Congrats haha thats a lot of league played xD
I just broke 4000 myself, a couple of games ago.

And we realise how much time we have invested into this game :P
